DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , observational , retrospective cross-sectional study conduct cohort consecutively select participant type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) treat sulphonylurea ( SU ) monotherapy SU + metformin ( MF ) combination therapy cardiologist , nephrologist , family practice doctor least 6 month prior study enrollment . The purpose study assess treatment pattern , goal attainment rate , long-term diabetes complication rate , frequency severity hypoglycemic episode among T2DM participant treat cardiology , nephrology family practice setting .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Low Blood Sugar Events Participants With Diabetes ( MK-0431-402 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Participants diagnose type 2 diabetes mellitus ( DM ) . Participants least 30 year age time type 2 DM diagnosis . Participants treat SU monotherapy SU + MF combination therapy least 6 month prior enrollment . Participants receive diabetes care cardiologist , nephrologist family practitioner least 6 month . Participants clinical record health care center . Participants whose medical record minimum core data set find ; core data define : age , gender , duration diabetes/age diagnosis , glucoselowering medication ( brand generic name , dosage , dose frequency , start stop date ) since start antihyperglycemic medication . Exclusion Criteria Participants Type 1 DM . Participants pregnant gestational DM . Participants receive antidiabetic treatment endocrinologist/diabetologist previous 6 month . Participants require daily concomitant usage insulin . Participants receive oral diabetes medication SU SU + MF . Participants already participate clinical trial clinical study . Participants would impossible complete questionnaire .
